FritzXML to vCard (vcf)

Convert phone books created by AVM's Fritz!Box to vcf files that are readeable by iPhone contacts app, and some Microsoft Software.

In: Fritz!Box XML

Select a file from your computer:
Or paste Fritz!Box phone book XML:
Convert multiple phone books, remove those vCards you do not require and download the remaining cards in a zip archive.

Out: vCards
